produits.index.title: Pet's Rações
produits.index.subtitle: Guaranteed express delivery: buy everything you need for your pet safely and conveniently at the best prices in the metropolitan area of Recife! Delivery within 2 hours via WhatsApp.
produits.index.favorite_brands: Discover the favorite brands of neighborhood pets
footer.address: Chemin des Ubaias, 286 - Casa Forte, Recife - PE, 52061-080, Brazil
quisommesnous: At Pet's Rações we are passionate by pets and we are committed to providing the best products and services. We offer bathing and grooming services, veterinary consultations, a variety of products and accessories, as well as food, medicines and vaccines. We are present in two addresses physical: Casa Forte and Piedade. Count on us to take care of your pet like if he was part of our family!
